text: Birger Olaus Vestermo (born 27 February 1930) is a Norwegian cross-country skier from Salangen. He competed in 50 km at the 1956 Winter Olympics in Cortina d'Ampezzo. ==Cross-country skiing results== ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border-collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background- color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:40px;"| Age ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 15 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 30 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 50 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 4 × 10 km relay |- | 1956 || 25 || — || — || style="background:#000; color:#fff;"| || — |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:People from Salangen Category:Norwegian male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Norway Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics
title: Birger Vestermo
